text: Mercedes Pulido de Briceño (22 March 1938 – 23 August 2016) was a Venezuelan politician, diplomat and social psychologist. She served as Minister of State for Women's Participation in Development from 1994 to 1996.Falleció la exministra Mercedes Pulido de Briceño She was President of the UNICEF Executive Board at the international level in 1997.Officers of the UNICEF Executive Board 1946–2014, UNICEFExecutive Board, UNICEF ==References== Category:Venezuelan women in politics Category:Chairmen and Presidents of UNICEF Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Venezuelan women diplomats Category:Venezuelan officials of the United Nations
title: Mercedes Pulido
